titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of International Water Safety Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Manufacturing, and Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 2/25/2013--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of International Water Safety Day. Acknowledges: (1) that water safety education should be included in primary and secondary school education, (2) the importance of water safety education, and (3) that every person should learn to swim.
